title: Murder Warrant Issued For 6th Street Shooter
content:
AUSTIN -- An arrest warrant for first-degree murder has been issued for a San Marcos man wanted in the early Sunday shooting spree that left one woman dead and four others wounded in Austin's downtown entertainment district.
The warrant reveals that the shooting resulted from a shoving incident between the suspect and another man, and that the shooting victims were random, unintended casualties.
Authorities said Monday that Endicott Ishmael McCray, 24, remained at large as investigators continued tracking leads to arrest him. Police warned that he likely is armed.
